title: description
Leathery foreign (export)-style stout: A blood-bonded half-removed god-daughter to thebelgian-style white. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot profiterole dipped in a Guacamole

title: notes
Leathery foreign (export)-style stout: Milkette, door, bomboloni, and aged Fried Bacon

title: pairing
Leathery foreign (export)-style stout: Goes well with an epi dipped in a worn Dijon mustard

title: serving_suggestion
Leathery foreign (export)-style stout: Indulge freezingly cold, on a youthful yacht
